cause.description:
-The incidence of autism is approximately 1 out of every 150 births. -Currently there is no cure for autism. However, there are various treatment options to ameliorate the symptoms. -There is no known single cause for autism.
What can we do to help? They leave it in our hands to make the difference.
1. Autism is vastly growing in every community throughout the world, and must come to and end.
2. Awareness alone makes the difference.
cause.name: Autism Awareness
